org.ingatan.component
Class IconFileView

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.filechooser.FileView
      org.ingatan.component.IconFileView

public class IconFileView
extends javax.swing.filechooser.FileView

An extension to fileview which allowed me to set custom icons for folders, image files, and non-image files.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas Everingham
